raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


For binding assays, monolayers of MDBK cells were incubated with 5 nM <sup>125</sup> I-IFNτ in phosphate buffered saline with 1% BSA for 2 hours at 4° C. in the presence or absence of a 1:30 dilution of sera containing antibodies raised against IFNτ peptides or the appropriate preimmune sera. 
Specific binding of 36% was determined by competition with 500 nM unlabeled IFNτ. 
Total counts bound were 6850±133, and a 100-fold molar excess of OVIFNτ produced 4398±158 counts per minute. 
In FIG. 17 the data from duplicate experiments are presented as the mean percent inhibition of OvIFNτ antiviral activity produced by antipeptide antisera relative to the appropriate preimmune sera ±standard error. 
Monolayers of MDBK cells were incubated with 20 units/ml of OvIFNτ in the presence a 1:30 dilution of either preimmune sera or antisera to each of the OvIFNτ peptides described above. 
The specific activity of the iodinated protein was 137 μCi/μg. 
Data from three replicate experiments are presented in FIG. 18 as the mean percent reduction of OvIFNτ specific binding produced by antipeptide antisera relative to the appropriate preimmune sera ±standard deviation.
